sqlMap.statement: SELECT HDR.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK AS MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK FROM MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR HDR WHERE HDR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND HDR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND HDR.RSVD_RVSL_DT >= #startDt# AND HDR.RSVD_RVSL_DT <= #rsvdRvslDt# AND HDR.AUTO_RVSL_FLG = 'Y' AND HDR.RVSL_CPLT_FLG = 'N' ORDER BY HDR.MAN_JRNL_ENTRY_HDR_PK
